name: plasma-fists
effect: After inflicting damage, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn, including status moves. This effect is applied after move type-changing abilities, such as Pixilate and Normalize.
short_effect: After inflicting damage, causes all Normal-type moves to become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn.

flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
